metadata.title: CVE-2024-35867 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:smb: client: fix potential UAF in cifs_stats_proc_show()Skip sessions that are being teared down (status == SES_EXITING) toavoid UAF.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
